title: 15 Billion Miles Away, NASA's Voyager 1 Comes Back to Life Using 1981 Tech
content: NASA's 47-year-old Voyager 1 spacecraft recently established contact with Earth after a brief halt with the help of a radio transmitter that has not been used since 1981.
summary: NASA's 47-year-old Voyager 1 spacecraft recently established contact with Earth after a brief halt with the help of a radio transmitter that has not been used since 1981.

title: Iron Beam: Israel's "New Era" Anti-Missile Defence System Will Use Lasers
content: Israel's 'Iron Beam', designed to use high-power laser to down projectiles, will be operational within a year.
summary: Israel's 'Iron Beam', designed to use high-power laser to down projectiles, will be operational within a year.

title: Over 200 Dead In Devastating Spain Flash Floods, Rescue Ops Underway
content: Rescuers raised the death toll in Spain's worst floods for a generation to 205 on Friday and fears grew for the dozens missing as hopes of finding survivors faded.
summary: Rescuers raised the death toll in Spain's worst floods for a generation to 205 on Friday and fears grew for the dozens missing as hopes of finding survivors faded.

title: Ukraine Needs Long-Range Missiles Against North Korean Troops: Zelensky
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky on Friday said Ukraine needed permission from its allies to fire long-range missiles into Russia in the face of a North Korean troop deployment there.
summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky on Friday said Ukraine needed permission from its allies to fire long-range missiles into Russia in the face of a North Korean troop deployment there.

title: B-52 Bombers, Missile Destroyers: US Announces New Middle East Deployments
content: The United States announced Friday the deployment of additional military assets to the Middle East, including ballistic missile defense destroyers and long-range B-52 bomber aircraft.
summary: The United States announced Friday the deployment of additional military assets to the Middle East, including ballistic missile defense destroyers and long-range B-52 bomber aircraft.

title: Trump's Violent Rhetoric Disqualifying For US Presidency: Kamala Harris
content: US Vice President Kamala Harris lambasted Donald Trump on Friday for her White House rival's "violent rhetoric," saying his recent verbal attack on a Republican critic should disqualify him from becoming president again.
summary: US Vice President Kamala Harris lambasted Donald Trump on Friday for her White House rival's "violent rhetoric," saying his recent verbal attack on a Republican critic should disqualify him from becoming president again.

title: Elon Musk Loses Bid To Move Case Over $1 Million Voter Prizes
content: A U.S. judge on Friday denied Elon Musk's bid to move a Pennsylvania lawsuit over his $1 million voter prizes to federal court, moving the case back to state court.
summary: A U.S. judge on Friday denied Elon Musk's bid to move a Pennsylvania lawsuit over his $1 million voter prizes to federal court, moving the case back to state court.

title: Israel Says It Killed One Of Hamas' Last Senior Officials In Gaza
content: The Palestinian group mourned the death of Kassab in a statement, adding that he was killed along with another Hamas official named Ayman Ayesh in an Israeli attack on their car in the enclave.
summary: The Palestinian group mourned the death of Kassab in a statement, adding that he was killed along with another Hamas official named Ayman Ayesh in an Israeli attack on their car in the enclave.

title: Gaza Cancer Patients Face Struggles In Jordan Amid Conflict: Report
content: As conflict escalates between Hezbollah and Israel, cancer patients from Gaza face significant emotional and medical challenges while receiving treatment in Jordan.
summary: As conflict escalates between Hezbollah and Israel, cancer patients from Gaza face significant emotional and medical challenges while receiving treatment in Jordan.

title: Chinese Woman's DNA Test Uncovers True Identity After Joke About Her Looks
content: A woman in Xinxiang, Henan province, recently uncovered that she is not biologically related to her parents after a DNA test, prompted by her coworkers' comments on her unique appearance.
summary: A woman in Xinxiang, Henan province, recently uncovered that she is not biologically related to her parents after a DNA test, prompted by her coworkers' comments on her unique appearance.

title: Ukrainians See US Election Outcome Less Pivotal For War With Russia
content: For many Ukrainians, the outcome of the US election next week and its impact on the war with Russia feels less likely to be pivotal than it once did.
summary: For many Ukrainians, the outcome of the US election next week and its impact on the war with Russia feels less likely to be pivotal than it once did.

title: Fears Of 2020 Repeat: Trump's Voter Fraud Claims Raise Concerns
content: With just four days left until Election Day, Donald Trump's baseless claims of voter fraud in Pennsylvania have raised concerns that he may attempt to overturn the vote, not just in Pennsylvania but also in other crucial battleground states.
summary: With just four days left until Election Day, Donald Trump's baseless claims of voter fraud in Pennsylvania have raised concerns that he may attempt to overturn the vote, not just in Pennsylvania but also in other crucial battleground states.

title: Mauritius Blocks Social Media Access Before Polls Over Wire-Tapping Scandal
content: The Indian Ocean island of Mauritius blocked access to social media on Friday, just days ahead of a general election, as tensions mounted over a wire-tapping scandal.
summary: The Indian Ocean island of Mauritius blocked access to social media on Friday, just days ahead of a general election, as tensions mounted over a wire-tapping scandal.

title: Immigrants Turned Citizens: What Drives Their Voting Decisions In 2024
content: As the US presidential election draws near, many of these new citizens are eager to exercise their right to vote, with some already knowing who they'll support.
summary: As the US presidential election draws near, many of these new citizens are eager to exercise their right to vote, with some already knowing who they'll support.

title: China To Allow Visa-Free Entry To Citizens From 9 More Countries
content: China will extend visa-free entry to citizens from nine additional countries, including South Korea, Norway and Finland, the foreign ministry said on Friday.
summary: China will extend visa-free entry to citizens from nine additional countries, including South Korea, Norway and Finland, the foreign ministry said on Friday.

title: Iran Braces For Potential Trump Return, Fearing Increased Sanctions
content: Iran's leadership and allies are bracing for what they would regard as a dreadful outcome of the imminent US presidential election: A return to power of Donald Trump.
summary: Iran's leadership and allies are bracing for what they would regard as a dreadful outcome of the imminent US presidential election: A return to power of Donald Trump.

title: Thai YouTuber Wanted For Fraud Caught Posing As Indonesian
content: Thai YouTuber Natthamon Khongchak, also known as "Nutty," was arrested and extradited to Thailand with her mother, Thaniya, following two years on the run in Indonesia.
summary: Thai YouTuber Natthamon Khongchak, also known as "Nutty," was arrested and extradited to Thailand with her mother, Thaniya, following two years on the run in Indonesia.

title: Opinion: US Elections: When The Great American Dream Turns Nightmare
content: Nearly nine in 10 voters believe America will suffer lasting harm if their side loses. Close to 60% of Kamala Harris supporters report feeling "frightened" about a Trump victory; 47% of Trump supporters feel similarly about a Harris win.
summary: Nearly nine in 10 voters believe America will suffer lasting harm if their side loses. Close to 60% of Kamala Harris supporters report feeling "frightened" about a Trump victory; 47% of Trump supporters feel similarly about a Harris win.

title: 'Kamala You Are Fired', Says Trump As Race For White House Remains Tight
content: The latest CNN polls showed that Harris has a narrow advantage in Michigan and Wisconsin, while she and Trump remain tied in Pennsylvania.
summary: The latest CNN polls showed that Harris has a narrow advantage in Michigan and Wisconsin, while she and Trump remain tied in Pennsylvania.

title: Russia Says It Launched Over 2,000 Drones At Ukraine In October
content: Russia launched more than 2,000 attack drones at civilian and military targets across Ukraine last month, Kyiv's military said on Friday, as Kremlin forces press a grinding offensive on the front line of their February 2022 invasion.
summary: Russia launched more than 2,000 attack drones at civilian and military targets across Ukraine last month, Kyiv's military said on Friday, as Kremlin forces press a grinding offensive on the front line of their February 2022 invasion.
